pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:5.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:5.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhaddāya kāpilāniyā antevāsinī bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍitvā gāmakaṃ ñātikulaṃ agamāsi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:5.3: Bhaddā kāpilānī taṃ bhikkhuniṃ apassantī bhikkhuniyo pucchi—“kahaṃ itthannāmā, na dissatī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:5.6: “Ammā, amukasmiṃ gāmake etissā ñātikulaṃ. Tattha gantvā vicinathā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:5.8: Bhikkhuniyo tattha gantvā taṃ bhikkhuniṃ passitvā etadavocuṃ—“kissa tvaṃ, ayye, ekikā āgatā, kaccisi appadhaṃsitā”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:6.1: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:6.3: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaraṃ gacchissatī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:6.4: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaraṃ gacchatī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:6.7: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaraṃ gacchissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:6.8: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:6.9: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:7.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaraṃ gaccheyya, ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṃghādisesan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:8.1: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:9.1: Tena kho pana samayena dve bhikkhuniyo sāketā sāvatthiṃ addhānamaggappaṭipannā honti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:9.3: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo nāvike upasaṅkamitvā etadavocuṃ—“sādhu no, āvuso, tārethā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:10.1: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo sāvatthiṃ gantvā bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:10.2: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:10.5: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:10.7: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī ekā nadīpāraṃ gacchatī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:10.10: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī ekā nadīpāraṃ gacchissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:10.11: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:10.12: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:11.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī ekā vā gāmantaraṃ gaccheyya, ekā vā nadīpāraṃ gaccheyya, ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṃghādisesan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:12.1: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:13.1: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhuniyo kosalesu janapade sāvatthiṃ gacchantā sāyaṃ aññataraṃ gāmaṃ upagacchiṃsu.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:13.2: Tattha aññatarā bhikkhunī abhirūpā hoti dassanīyā pāsādikā. Aññataro puriso tassā bhikkhuniyā saha dassanena paṭibaddhacitto hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:13.4: Atha kho so puriso tāsaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ seyyaṃ paññapento tassā bhikkhuniyā seyyaṃ ekamantaṃ paññāpesi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:13.5: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī sallakkhetvā—“pariyuṭṭhito ayaṃ puriso; sace rattiṃ āgacchissati, vissaro me bhavissatī”ti,
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:13.7: bhikkhuniyo anāpucchā aññataraṃ kulaṃ gantvā seyyaṃ kappesi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:13.8: Atha kho so puriso rattiṃ āgantvā taṃ bhikkhuniṃ gavesanto bhikkhuniyo ghaṭṭesi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:13.9: Bhikkhuniyo taṃ bhikkhuniṃ apassantiyo evamāhaṃsu—“nissaṃsayaṃ kho sā bhikkhunī purisena saddhiṃ nikkhantā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:14.1: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī tassā rattiyā accayena yena tā bhikkhuniyo tenupasaṅkami. Bhikkhuniyo taṃ bhikkhuniṃ etadavocuṃ—“kissa tvaṃ, ayye, purisena saddhiṃ nikkhantā”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:14.6: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:14.8: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhunī ekā rattiṃ vippavasissatī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:14.9: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī ekā rattiṃ vippavasatī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:14.12: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī ekā rattiṃ vippavasissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:14.13: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:14.14: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:15.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī ekā vā gāmantaraṃ gaccheyya, ekā vā nadīpāraṃ gaccheyya, ekā vā rattiṃ vippavaseyya, ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṃghādisesan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:16.1: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:17.1: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhuniyo kosalesu janapade sāvatthiṃ addhānamaggappaṭipannā honti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:17.2: Tattha aññatarā bhikkhunī vaccena pīḷitā ekikā ohīyitvā pacchā agamāsi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:17.4: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī yena tā bhikkhuniyo tenupasaṅkami. Bhikkhuniyo taṃ bhikkhuniṃ etadavocuṃ—“kissa tvaṃ, ayye, ekikā ohīnā, kaccisi appadhaṃsitā”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:18.1: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:18.3: kathañhi nāma bhikkhunī ekā gaṇamhā ohīyissatīti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:18.4: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī ekā gaṇamhā ohīyatī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:18.7: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī ekā gaṇamhā ohīyissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:18.8: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:18.9: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:19.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī ekā vā gāmantaraṃ gaccheyya, ekā vā nadīpāraṃ gaccheyya, ekā vā rattiṃ vippavaseyya, ekā vā gaṇamhā ohīyeyya, ayampi bhikkhunī paṭhamāpattikaṃ dhammaṃ āpannā nissāraṇīyaṃ saṃghādisesan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:20.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:22.1: Aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ paṭhamaṃ pādaṃ atikkāmentiyā āpatti thullaccayassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:23.2: nadī nāma timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādetvā yattha katthaci uttarantiyā bhikkhuniyā antaravāsako temiyati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:24.2: saha aruṇuggamanā dutiyikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthapāsaṃ vijahantiyā āpatti thullaccayassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-ss3:25.2: agāmake araññe dutiyikāya bhikkhuniyā dassanūpacāraṃ vā savanūpacāraṃ vā vijahantiyā āpatti thullaccayassa.
